issue.title: [Rust]: Make full integration of ARMv7
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow is not ready for ARMv7. It needs an effort to finalize the full integration.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10507?focusedCommentId=17332144) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
